title: Post your mystery skins!
body:
So, anyone get SG Udyr?

Pulsfire?

Post what skins you got from the mystery gifts (if you bought one!)

Personally i got snow day ziggs, sultan trynd and earnest elf trist!

replies.body: hmmxD i got pool party lee skin, but... i want to get champion ship riven doe D;
I don't think you can get championship Riven :/
But ;C they should put her skin into it;//

I got SG Udyr.

Mind you, this was about 50 mystery gifts in, so getting an ultimate was more inevitability than luck.
i got nutcracko, curling vei and scuba gragas
My personal favourites from mystery gifts were Lord Dardar, Amethyst Ashe, Earnest Elf Trist, Snow Bunny Nidalee and IBlitzcrank.
i got earnest elf aswell lol

Got really bad skins:
Leopard Nidalee
Blacksmith Poppy
Spectral Fiddlesticks
Dark Crystal Ryze
Deep Terror Thresh
Union Jack Fiddlesticks
Deep terror thresh, blacksmith poppy are good.

> Deep terror thresh, blacksmith poppy are good.

I got French Maid Nidalee just then.
I got Demonblade Tryn, Dark Candy fiddle, TPA Shen, Atlantean Fizz and Lord Mordekaiser
I want SG Udyr... however I have gotten Slay Belle {{champion:55}} , Battleborn {{champion:10}} and Blood Lord {{champion:8}} ... YAY
yay your back! eee! its me kudosinc!

Hello,

How have you been dear?
I'm not sure if I'm officially back, or just popping in for a little :).
Last exam tomorrow, so I'll be grinding games again. 
Maybe I'll wander back; I do get addicted to this place.

Plus I really like the report feature they've added as well as the notification for replies.
So convenient.

-Mere Intricacy <3
Can't really remember off the top of my head all of them. But some of the best were Dragonblade Riven, Pulsefire Ezreal, Firefighter Tristana
